column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The appetizers/tapas were fairly good
column2: and the desserts were great (special shout out to the Macrona almond tart
column3: baby you rocked my world).  Nice atmosphere as well
column4: although it is very hard to hear past the person seated next to you.  The reason for my three star review was how utterly disappointed I was in the main course (we ordered both the seafood and the chicken paella).  The rice was far too short on the saffron and far too strong on the tomato
column5: and paella should never be overwhelmingly tomato.  If I came back here
column6: I'd skip the paella and just do tapas and dessert.
